entry.title: My First Blog Post
entry.content:
Hi,

This is my very first post on my blog after several month or years (?) planning to do it finally iâ€™ve really done it (eventhough just meaningless post) :)

This blog using jekyll a static theme generator specificly for building blog. Lack of documentation, but quite easy to use.

Warm Regards,
